## System information
  - node version:
  - npm or yarn version:
  - OS/version/architecture:
  - Applicable nodegit version:

```
node -v
npm -v # (or yarn -v)
node -e "console.log(process.platform)"
node -e "console.log(require('os').release())"
node -e "console.log(console.log(process.arch))"
```
